ModMetaData.name: [Alien/Race] Seren, from Stardust
ModMetaData.author: OdysseyLotus
ModMetaData.description: As the Empire grew throughout the galaxy, they soon came upon the planet of Panastria, the home of the Seren, a race of people supposedly made out of stardust. Tensions rose as the Empire attempted their takeover, and there soon came to be the Seren Uprising. While they were valient in their efforts, the Seren lost their war against the Empire. After their victory, the Empire sought to make sure that they couldn't rise again, so they began a program of Seren relocation throughout the galaxy. Now, many inhabit rimworlds in small colonies, dreaming of their former glory.
